properties.entry: SELECT MARATHON_NO ,MARATHON_NAME ,LOCATION ,REGION ,MARATHON_DATE ,MARATHON_SITE ,ORGANIZER ,OTHER_INTRODUCTION FROM MARATHON_INFO WHERE STATUS='Y' ORDER BY MARATHON_NO

SELECT MARATHON_NO ,MARATHON_NAME ,LOCATION ,REGION ,MARATHON_DATE ,APPLICATION_DATE ,OTHER_INTRODUCTION ,ORGANIZER ,ORGANIZER_HOST ,ORGANIZER_PHONE ,MARATHON_SITE ,STATUS ,MARATHON_COURSE FROM MARATHON_INFO WHERE MARATHON_NO=?
